name: DOTPLONG
description:
No really, just another pong interpretation. Enhanced with clones, obstacles and explosions! But be careful the controls are pretty different :-)

You will need a Monitor and PC Graphics Adapter which supports the shader model 2.0. Thats it... hopefully! Best played with black Microsoft XBox 360 Controllers.

There is also a OUYA Version of the Game on the OUYA app thingy store.

Controls

You will find a controller mapping in game in the help menu. For keyboard control you can use the following list.

P1 Controls
w - Up
s - Down
q - cursor left
e - cursor right
r - rotate obstacle
c - explosion!

P2 Controls
arrowUp - Up
arrowDown - Down
o - cursor left
p - cursor right
i - rotate obstacle
l - explosion!

General
Return - Ok
Esc - Back

Thats it maybe... you will find it out.
